description: TokenReview attempts to authenticate a token to a known user. Note: TokenReview requests may be cached by the webhook token authenticator plugin in the kube-apiserver.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

spec.description: Spec holds information about the request being evaluated

status.description: Status is filled in by the server and indicates whether the request can be authenticated.
